resources.string: Jigogi shine tsarin tsarin. Yana bayarda hotunan bango da zaɓuɓɓukan keɓancewa da yawa. Har yanzu kuna iya amfani da Jigogi ta hanyar Saituna bayan kun cire gajeriyar hanyar allo.

"Sauya wannan madannin, na nufin ka janye yardaka ga Bayanan Sirri na Jigogi. Za mu daina tattara keɓaɓɓun bayananka. Bayanin sirri da aka riga aka tattara kuma aka adana za a share su a cikin takamaiman lokacin kamar yadda dokokin ƙa'idodi suka buƙata. Jigogi yana buƙatar tattara bayanai na sirri don samar muku da ayyukan yau da kullun. Za a gudanar da janyewar izininka ga Bayanan Sirrin sa a matsayin ƙin yarda da ayyukanta bisa ga bayanan sirri da aka tattara."
"Na'urarka tana buƙatar haɗawa da hanyar sadarwar don ka sami damar janye yarda. Duba saittunan hanyar sadarwar ku kuma sake gwadawa."

"Muna buƙatar tattara bayanan sirri na sirri don samar muku da ayyukan yau da kullun. Kuna iya koyon yadda muke sarrafa bayanan da muke tarawa a cikin Sharuddan Bayanai. Karanta kuma ka yarda da Yarjejeniyar Mai Amfanin mu da Sharuddan Bayanai kafin amfani da Jigogi. Kana iya ka janye izinin ku ga Sharuddan Bayanan Jigogi a cikin Saittuna a kowane lokaci."
